column5: the Anti-Tech Crime Department has cooperated with Police Inspectorate of Phnom Penh Police Commissariat detained two foreign men.------ Vladymyr Antonevycm
column9: are both from Ukraine.------The charges are not clear
column10: the source says they are over ‘cases of collusion with other foreign passports to trafficking’
column11: which sounds like selling fake or stolen passports.------After the arrest
column12: both suspects were sent to the prosecution department of the Phnom Penh Municipal Court to hand over the case.------Updates to follow. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/448982
